body_text:
What does K.Y. mean? There's this scene in Nichijou episode one where a Grim Reaper is asking everyone:
Is this supposed to be a joke? I don't really understand what happened.

What's Agepoyo and Doyagao? In the last episode of Danshi Koukousei no Nichijou, part "High School Boys and Lies", Motoharu asks Yoshitake about different things to which Yoshitake gives absurd replies (with the exception of the last one):
I understand all of them except Doyagao and Agepoyo. Tried googling but didn't get it. Can someone explain them simply?
